content:
Glenn just gave me some essential supplies.
What was it? Hmm... care to guess?
It's a tent! *smiles* Make sure to get yours from him.

content:
Grassy meadows, flower beds, riverbanks...
Hmm? I'm looking for a
suitable spot for my tent, what about you~?

content:
Have you picked up your tent yet?
If not, remember to ask Glenn about it.
One tent comes with one bed - perfect for getting some proper rest.

looking around now, I'd say it was all worthwhile!
